name: ginseng demo
description:
the demo for my upcoming platformer, ginseng! play as a backwoods birb on a journey to cure death. this is the main menu and the first two levels. i plan to have ~30 levels spread across 5 "worlds." each world comes with its own palette and background reminiscent of the Appalachian foothills.

the game saves when you reach a new level! press ESC to return to the main menu at any time.

DON'T hit "new game" unless you really really mean it!

Controls:

WASD to move, K to run, J to jump

Hold J after a jump to flap your wings (OR hold Space mid-air)

Space and J to super jump

Hold S to fast fall

R to reload level
